final_project.data_collection.tasks.download_data.canvas module¶

Utils for accessing and submitting to Canvas

class final_project.data_collection.tasks.download_data.canvas.CanvasApiAdapter¶

Bases: object

Adapts canvasapi package to work with CSCI-E29 desired convention

get_all_module_names() → List[str]¶
Returns:A list of all existing module names given the initialized course
get_course(name: str) → Optional[canvasapi.course.Course]¶

:param name :str the course name to find :return: the searched Course if found. If not found returns None

get_module(name: str) → canvasapi.module.Module¶
Parameters:name – str, the desired name of the module object
Returns:the module object with the desired name
Raises:ModuleNotFoundException if given name doesn’t match

any module. This is case sensitive, so make sure capitalization is correct.

get_module_item(module_name: str, item_name: str) → canvasapi.module.ModuleItem¶
Parameters:
  • module_name – str, the desired name of the module object
  • item_name – str, the desired name of the module item object
Returns:

the module item object with the desired name
Raises:

ModuleNotFoundException if given name doesn’t match

any module. This is case sensitive, so make sure capitalization is correct.

get_module_items(name: str) → List[canvasapi.module.ModuleItem]¶
Parameters:name – str, the desired name of the module object
Returns:A list of all items in the module
